OSOWNERBS1.osval_d_valuation osval ON osval.osval_pk = osexp.valuation_osval_fk --JOIN osbsd_d_business_day osbsd ON oseds.start_of_day_date = osbsd.business_day AND osbsd.osbsd_pk = osexp.business_day_osbsd_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.ostra_d_transaction ostra ON ostra.ostra_pk = osexp.transaction_ostra_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.oscha_d_chain_vw oscha ON oscha.oscha_pk = osexp.chain_oscha_fk JOIN RDCOD_CTE tratyp ON tratyp.rdcod_pk = osexp.transaction_type_rdcod_fk JOIN RDCOD_CTE instyp ON instyp.rdcod_pk = osexp.instrument_type_rdcod_fk JOIN RDCOD_CTE transtyp ON transtyp.rdcod_pk = osexp.transport_type_rdcod_fk JOIN RDCOD_CTE busev ON busev.rdcod_pk = osexp.business_event_rdcod_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdibu_ist_business_unit rdibu ON rdibu.rdibu_pk = osexp.ist_business_unit_rdibu_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdlge_legal_entity rdlge ON rdlge.rdlge_pk = rdibu.legal_entity_rdlge_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdreg_region rdreg ON rdreg.rdreg_pk = osexp.region_rdreg_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdchp_chain_prefix rdchp ON rdchp.rdchp_pk = oscha.chain_prefix_rdchp_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.rdloc_d_market_vw rdloc ON rdloc.rdloc_pk = osexp.market_location_rdloc_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdfac_facility rdfac ON rdfac.rdfac_pk = osexp.inventory_facility_rdfac_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.rdsrc_d_source_vw rdsrc ON rdsrc.rdsrc_pk = osexp.source_rdsrc_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.rdgrd_d_grade_vw rdgrd ON rdgrd.rdgrd_pk = osexp.pricing_grade_rdgrd_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rddet_delivery_term rddet ON rddet.rddet_pk = osexp.delivery_terms_rddet_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rddep_delivery_period rddep ON rddep.rddep_pk = osexp.series_period_rddep_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.rdepe_d_expiry_period_vw rdepe ON rdepe.rdepe_pk = osexp.col_gas_rdepe_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.rdsdf_d_series_def_vw rdsdf ON rdsdf.rdsdf_pk = osexp.series_def_rdsdf_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdobt_observation_type rdobt ON rdobt.rdobt_pk = osexp.observation_type_rdobt_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdfdt_formatted_date rdfdt ON rdfdt.rdfdt_pk = osexp.exposure_date_rdfdt_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdfdt_formatted_date rdfdtcon ON rdfdtcon.rdfdt_pk = osexp.contract_month_rdfdt_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdfdt_formatted_date rdfdtre ON rdfdtre.rdfdt_pk = osexp.roll_early_exp_date_fdfdt_fk JOIN RDCOD_CTE eodstat ON eodstat.rdcod_pk = oseds.end_of_day_status_rdcod_fk JOIN RDCOD_CTE eodtype ON eodtype.rdcod_pk = oseds.eod_type_rdcod_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.rdpty_d_party_vw rdpty ON rdpty.rdpty_pk = ostra.counterparty_rdpty_fk LEFT JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdlge_legal_entity rdptylge ON rdptylge.rdlge_pk = rdpty.legal_entity_rdlge_fk LEFT JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdlge_legal_entity rdptylge3 ON rdptylge3.rdlge_pk = ostra.counterparty_rdpty_fk JOIN RDCOD_CTE rdcod_temptyp ON rdcod_temptyp.rdcod_pk = rdsdf.template_type_rdcod_fk JOIN RDCOD_CTE evntcat ON evntcat.rdcod_pk = osval.event_category_rdcod_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.rddpr_d_deriv_product_vw rddpr ON rddpr.rddpr_pk = ostra.deriv_product_rddpr_fk LEFT JOIN OSOWNERBS1.rdpun_pricing_unit_vw rdpun ON rdpun.rdpun_pk = ostra.strike_pricing_unit_rdpun_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdgrd_grade rdgrd_phy_inv ON ostra.grade_rdgrd_fk = rdgrd_phy_inv.rdgrd_pk LEFT JOIN RDCOD_CTE rdcodlge ON rdcodlge.rdcod_pk = rdlge.dodd_frank_status_rdcod_fk LEFT JOIN RDCOD_CTE rdcodcp ON rdcodcp.rdcod_pk = rdptylge.dodd_frank_status_rdcod_fk LEFT JOIN RDCOD_CTE rdcodcp3 ON rdcodcp3.rdcod_pk = rdptylge3.dodd_frank_status_rdcod_fk WHERE NOT ( tratyp.name = 'FUTURE' AND osexp.daily_volume_bbl = 0 AND osexp.daily_mass_mt = 0 AND osexp.daily_volume_m3 = 0 ) --AND rdfdt.base_date >= osbsd.business_day --rev7 /* --2.01 AND osexp.subpartition_key = 'S'||oseds.system_id --2.00 */ --2.01 $$NON_UEH_EXTRACT_START --2.01 AND osexp.subpartition_key = concat('S',oseds.system_id) --2.00 $$NON_UEH_EXTRACT_END
--2.01 $$NON_GLOBAL_SQL_START --2.01 and osexp.subpartition_key in ('SGOPS', 'SMUREX') --1.15 $$NON_GLOBAL_SQL_END --2.01 AND rddpr.rddpr_pk = ostra.deriv_product_rddpr_fk --1.12 AND mod(osexp.osexp_pk,10) in (0,1) -- mod(osexp.osexp_pk,10) in (2,3) --2.02 -- mod(osexp.osexp_pk,10) in (4,5) --2.02 -- mod(osexp.osexp_pk,10) in (6,7) --2.02 -- mod(osexp.osexp_pk,10) in (8,9) --2.02 ) ODS_EXPOSURE WHERE oseds_end_of_day_id =$$END_OF_DAY_ID )ODS_EXPOSURE1 join OSOWNERBS1.osbsd_d_business_day osbsd ON ODS_EXPOSURE1.start_of_day_date = osbsd.business_day AND osbsd.osbsd_pk = ODS_EXPOSURE1.business_day_osbsd_fk

osexp.exposure_date_rdfdt_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdfdt_formatted_date rdfdtcon ON rdfdtcon.rdfdt_pk = osexp.contract_month_rdfdt_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdfdt_formatted_date rdfdtre ON rdfdtre.rdfdt_pk = osexp.roll_early_exp_date_fdfdt_fk JOIN RDCOD_CTE eodstat ON eodstat.rdcod_pk = oseds.end_of_day_status_rdcod_fk JOIN RDCOD_CTE eodtype ON eodtype.rdcod_pk = oseds.eod_type_rdcod_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.rdpty_d_party_vw rdpty ON rdpty.rdpty_pk = ostra.counterparty_rdpty_fk LEFT JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdlge_legal_entity rdptylge ON rdptylge.rdlge_pk = rdpty.legal_entity_rdlge_fk LEFT JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdlge_legal_entity rdptylge3 ON rdptylge3.rdlge_pk = ostra.counterparty_rdpty_fk JOIN RDCOD_CTE rdcod_temptyp ON rdcod_temptyp.rdcod_pk = rdsdf.template_type_rdcod_fk JOIN RDCOD_CTE evntcat ON evntcat.rdcod_pk = osval.event_category_rdcod_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.rddpr_d_deriv_product_vw rddpr ON rddpr.rddpr_pk = ostra.deriv_product_rddpr_fk LEFT JOIN OSOWNERBS1.rdpun_pricing_unit_vw rdpun ON rdpun.rdpun_pk = ostra.strike_pricing_unit_rdpun_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdgrd_grade rdgrd_phy_inv ON ostra.grade_rdgrd_fk = rdgrd_phy_inv.rdgrd_pk LEFT JOIN RDCOD_CTE rdcodlge ON rdcodlge.rdcod_pk = rdlge.dodd_frank_status_rdcod_fk LEFT JOIN RDCOD_CTE rdcodcp ON rdcodcp.rdcod_pk = rdptylge.dodd_frank_status_rdcod_fk LEFT JOIN RDCOD_CTE rdcodcp3 ON rdcodcp3.rdcod_pk = rdptylge3.dodd_frank_status_rdcod_fk WHERE NOT ( tratyp.name = 'FUTURE' AND osexp.daily_volume_bbl = 0 AND osexp.daily_mass_mt = 0 AND osexp.daily_volume_m3 = 0 ) --AND rdfdt.base_date >= $$NON_UEH_EXTRACT_END

coalesce(rdlge.us_federal_id,' ') = coalesce(rdptylge.us_federal_id,' ') then 0 when rdpty.relationship_name != 'IST ENTITY' and coalesce(rdlge.us_federal_id,' ') = coalesce(rdptylge3.us_federal_id,' ') then 0 else 1 end dodd_frank_indicator, rdcodlge.name LGE_DODD_FRANK_STATUS, CASE when rdpty.relationship_name = 'IST ENTITY' then rdcodcp.name else rdcodcp3.name end COUNTERPARTY_DODD_FRANK_STATUS, rdpty.relationship_name COUNTERPARTY_RELATIONSHIP, --2.06 oseds.start_of_day_date start_of_day_date FROM OSOWNERBS1.oseds_end_of_day_status oseds LEFT JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdreg_region oseds_reg ON oseds_reg.rdreg_pk = oseds.wd1_region_rdreg_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.osexp_f_exposure osexp ON oseds.end_of_day_id = osexp.end_of_day_id JOIN OSOWNERBS1.osval_d_valuation osval ON osval.osval_pk = osexp.valuation_osval_fk --JOIN osbsd_d_business_day osbsd ON oseds.start_of_day_date = osbsd.business_day AND osbsd.osbsd_pk = osexp.business_day_osbsd_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.ostra_d_transaction ostra ON ostra.ostra_pk = osexp.transaction_ostra_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.oscha_d_chain_vw oscha ON oscha.oscha_pk = osexp.chain_oscha_fk JOIN RDCOD_CTE tratyp ON tratyp.rdcod_pk = osexp.transaction_type_rdcod_fk JOIN RDCOD_CTE instyp ON instyp.rdcod_pk = osexp.instrument_type_rdcod_fk JOIN RDCOD_CTE transtyp ON transtyp.rdcod_pk = osexp.transport_type_rdcod_fk JOIN RDCOD_CTE busev ON busev.rdcod_pk = osexp.business_event_rdcod_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdibu_ist_business_unit rdibu ON rdibu.rdibu_pk = osexp.ist_business_unit_rdibu_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdlge_legal_entity rdlge ON rdlge.rdlge_pk = rdibu.legal_entity_rdlge_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdreg_region rdreg ON rdreg.rdreg_pk = osexp.region_rdreg_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdchp_chain_prefix rdchp ON rdchp.rdchp_pk = oscha.chain_prefix_rdchp_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.rdloc_d_market_vw rdloc ON rdloc.rdloc_pk = osexp.market_location_rdloc_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdfac_facility rdfac ON rdfac.rdfac_pk = osexp.inventory_facility_rdfac_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.rdsrc_d_source_vw rdsrc ON rdsrc.rdsrc_pk = osexp.source_rdsrc_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.rdgrd_d_grade_vw rdgrd ON rdgrd.rdgrd_pk = osexp.pricing_grade_rdgrd_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rddet_delivery_term rddet ON rddet.rddet_pk = osexp.delivery_terms_rddet_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rddep_delivery_period rddep ON rddep.rddep_pk = osexp.series_period_rddep_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.rdepe_d_expiry_period_vw rdepe ON rdepe.rdepe_pk = osexp.col_gas_rdepe_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.rdsdf_d_series_def_vw rdsdf ON rdsdf.rdsdf_pk = osexp.series_def_rdsdf_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdobt_observation_type rdobt ON rdobt.rdobt_pk = osexp.observation_type_rdobt_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdfdt_formatted_date rdfdt ON rdfdt.rdfdt_pk = osexp.exposure_date_rdfdt_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdfdt_formatted_date rdfdtcon ON rdfdtcon.rdfdt_pk = osexp.contract_month_rdfdt_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdfdt_formatted_date rdfdtre ON rdfdtre.rdfdt_pk = osexp.roll_early_exp_date_fdfdt_fk JOIN RDCOD_CTE eodstat ON eodstat.rdcod_pk = oseds.end_of_day_status_rdcod_fk JOIN RDCOD_CTE eodtype ON eodtype.rdcod_pk = oseds.eod_type_rdcod_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.rdpty_d_party_vw rdpty ON rdpty.rdpty_pk = ostra.counterparty_rdpty_fk LEFT JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdlge_legal_entity rdptylge ON rdptylge.rdlge_pk = rdpty.legal_entity_rdlge_fk LEFT JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdlge_legal_entity rdptylge3 ON rdptylge3.rdlge_pk = ostra.counterparty_rdpty_fk JOIN RDCOD_CTE rdcod_temptyp ON rdcod_temptyp.rdcod_pk = rdsdf.template_type_rdcod_fk JOIN RDCOD_CTE evntcat ON evntcat.rdcod_pk = osval.event_category_rdcod_fk JOIN OSOWNERBS1.rddpr_d_deriv_product_vw rddpr ON rddpr.rddpr_pk = ostra.deriv_product_rddpr_fk LEFT JOIN OSOWNERBS1.rdpun_pricing_unit_vw rdpun ON rdpun.rdpun_pk = ostra.strike_pricing_unit_rdpun_fk JOIN RDOWNERBS1.rdgrd_grade rdgrd_phy_inv ON ostra.grade_rdgrd_fk = rdgrd_phy_inv.rdgrd_pk LEFT JOIN RDCOD_CTE rdcodlge ON rdcodlge.rdcod_pk = rdlge.dodd_frank_status_rdcod_fk LEFT JOIN RDCOD_CTE rdcodcp ON rdcodcp.rdcod_pk = rdptylge.dodd_frank_status_rdcod_fk LEFT JOIN RDCOD_CTE rdcodcp3 ON rdcodcp3.rdcod_pk = rdptylge3.dodd_frank_status_rdcod_fk WHERE NOT ( tratyp.name = 'FUTURE' AND osexp.daily_volume_bbl = 0 AND osexp.daily_mass_mt = 0 AND osexp.daily_volume_m3 = 0 ) --AND rdfdt.base_date >= osbsd.business_day --rev7 /* --2.01 AND osexp.subpartition_key = 'S'||oseds.system_id --2.00 */ --2.01 $$NON_UEH_EXTRACT_START --2.01 AND osexp.subpartition_key = concat('S',oseds.system_id) --2.00 $$NON_UEH_EXTRACT_END
--2.01 $$NON_GLOBAL_SQL_START --2.01 and osexp.subpartition_key in ('SGOPS', 'SMUREX') --1.15 $$NON_GLOBAL_SQL_END --2.01 AND rddpr.rddpr_pk = ostra.deriv_product_rddpr_fk --1.12 AND -- mod(osexp.osexp_pk,10) in (0,1) -- mod(osexp.osexp_pk,10) in (2,3) --2.02 -- mod(osexp.osexp_pk,10) in (4,5) --2.02 -- mod(osexp.osexp_pk,10) in (6,7) --2.02 mod(osexp.osexp_pk,10) in (8,9) --2.02 ) ODS_EXPOSURE WHERE oseds_end_of_day_id =$$END_OF_DAY_ID )ODS_EXPOSURE1 join OSOWNERBS1.osbsd_d_business_day osbsd ON ODS_EXPOSURE1.start_of_day_date = osbsd.business_day AND osbsd.osbsd_pk = ODS_EXPOSURE1.business_day_osbsd_fk

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT ODS_SOR_SYSTEM_OF_RECORD.OSSOR_PK as OSSOR_PK, ODS_SOR_SYSTEM_OF_RECORD.CHAIN_PREFIX as CHAIN_PREFIX, ODS_SOR_SYSTEM_OF_RECORD.SYSTEM_OF_RECORD_RDCOD_FK as SYSTEM_OF_RECORD_RDCOD_FK, ODS_SOR_SYSTEM_OF_RECORD.SYSTEM_OF_RECORD as SYSTEM_OF_RECORD, ODS_SOR_SYSTEM_OF_RECORD.VALID_FROM as VALID_FROM, ODS_SOR_SYSTEM_OF_RECORD.VALID_TO as VALID_TO, ODS_SOR_SYSTEM_OF_RECORD.CHAIN_PREFIX_RDCHP_FK as CHAIN_PREFIX_RDCHP_FK FROM ( select null ossor_pk, oscha.chain_prefix_rdchp_fk, oscha.chain_prefix, ossor.system_of_record_rdcod_fk, coalesce(substr(rdsor.name,1,1),'T') system_of_record, to_char(ossor.valid_from,'YYYYMMDD') valid_from, coalesce(to_char(ossor.valid_to,'YYYYMMDD'),'99991231') valid_to from (select distinct chain_prefix_rdchp_fk, chain_prefix from oscha_d_chain_vw) oscha left outer join ossor_system_of_record ossor on ossor.chain_prefix_rdchp_fk = oscha.chain_prefix_rdchp_fk left outer join rdcod_code rdsor on ossor.system_of_record_rdcod_fk = rdsor.rdcod_pk )ODS_SOR_SYSTEM_OF_RECORD
